parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: EventName
parameters.description: The name of the alert event. The value indicates a subtype.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The condition that is used to query alert events by asset. You can enter an IP address, a public IP address, an internal IP address, or an asset name for fuzzy match.

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.
